QUESTIONS.TITLE: What is your app, and how does it work?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Our app is a location-based event recommendation platform that uses publicly shared pictures stored on a heatmap to suggest the best events in your area. It analyzes photos to identify popular places. Data will be reset every 24 hours to ensure that the information is current.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: How do I get started with your app?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: To get started, simply download and install the app from the Google Play Store. Open the app, allow location access, and explore the events recommended in your area.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: Can I contribute to the heatmap?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Yes, you can! We encourage users to share photos of events and places they visit. This helps enhance the accuracy of our recommendations.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: How frequently are the recommendations updated?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: The recommendations are updated in real-time. As new photos are shared and analyzed, the heatmap adapts to reflect current events and popular locations.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: I'm not seeing any recommendations. What should I do?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Ensure that you have granted location access to the app. Make sure your GPS is enabled, and you're in an area with sufficient user activity for recommendations to be generated.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What happens to the photos I share in the app?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: We store and share publicly posted user photos. The shared information is used by our algorithms to recommend popular events, aswell as providing live insight to other users.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: How is user data protected in your app?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: User data privacy and security are paramount to us. We use encryption and follow best practices to safeguard your data.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: How do I get started with your app?
QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION: To get started, simply download and install the app from the Google Play Store. Open the app, allow location access, and explore the events recommended in your area.
